name: Fluent - Language Learning While Browsing
description: Learn Spanish, French, or German naturally by seeing 5-6 word translations as you browse

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://fluent-translator.workers.dev https://fluent-translator.hq.workers.dev https://api.cognitive.microsofttranslator.com; font-src 'self'; frame-src 'none'; media-src 'none'; worker-src 'none'; base-uri 'none'; form-action 'none';
